price: ߊ߬ ߞߵߊ߬ ߕߍ߮ ߝߣߊ߫ ߓߏ߬ߛߌ߬ ߸ ߏ߬ ߞߍ߫ ߘߊ߫ ߜߍߡߊ߲ ߘߌ߫ ߘߐ߬ߜߍ߬ߟߌ߬ߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߢߣߊ߫
arabic: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُۥ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيۡضَآءُ لِلنَّٰظِرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wanazaʿa yadahu fa-idhā hiya bayḍāu lilnnāẓirīna
